issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: euca-run-instances: error (InternalFailure): Failed to verify references for request: RunInstancesType:4f717142-a853-4144-81a4-2ced8a08e37b:return=true:epoch=null:status=null because of: Failed to lookup image: NULL because of example: [MachineImageInfo kernelId=null ramdiskId=null virtType=null imageConversionId=null runManifestLocation=null manifestLocation=null signature=null checksum=null checksumType=null bundleSizeBytes=null imageName=null description=null architecture=null imagePublic=null platform=null imageType=machine permissions=[] productCodes=[] deviceMappings=[] imageSizeBytes=null imageFormat=null tags=null fullName=null ownerUserId=null ownerUserName=null ownerAccountNumber=null uniqueName=null ownerFullNameCached=null state=null lastState=null stateChangeStack=null displayName=NULL id=null version=null creationTimestamp=null lastUpdateTimestamp=null naturalId=null]
fields.summary: Provide better error message when imaging worker is not configured and run-instance requested

comments.body:
Just built a new setup today based on testing and still see the exact same error:

{noformat}
[root@c-08 vic-centos-img]# euca-describe-services 
SERVICE	user-api          	API_43    	API_43               	ENABLED 	30  	http://10.111.1.43:8773/services/User-API	arn:euca:bootstrap:API_43:user-api:API_43/
SERVICE	autoscaling       	API_43    	API_43.autoscaling   	ENABLED 	30  	http://10.111.1.43:8773/services/AutoScaling	arn:euca:bootstrap:API_43:autoscaling:API_43.autoscaling/
SERVICE	cloudwatch        	API_43    	API_43.cloudwatch    	ENABLED 	30  	http://10.111.1.43:8773/services/CloudWatch	arn:euca:bootstrap:API_43:cloudwatch:API_43.cloudwatch/
SERVICE	compute           	API_43    	API_43.compute       	ENABLED 	30  	http://10.111.1.43:8773/services/compute	arn:euca:bootstrap:API_43:compute:API_43.compute/
SERVICE	euare             	API_43    	API_43.euare         	ENABLED 	30  	http://10.111.1.43:8773/services/Euare	arn:euca:bootstrap:API_43:euare:API_43.euare/
SERVICE	loadbalancing     	API_43    	API_43.loadbalancing 	ENABLED 	30  	http://10.111.1.43:8773/services/LoadBalancing	arn:euca:bootstrap:API_43:loadbalancing:API_43.loadbalancing/
SERVICE	objectstorage     	API_43    	API_43.objectstorage 	ENABLED 	30  	http://10.111.1.43:8773/services/objectstorage	arn:euca:bootstrap:API_43:objectstorage:API_43.objectstorage/
SERVICE	tokens            	API_43    	API_43.tokens        	ENABLED 	30  	http://10.111.1.43:8773/services/Tokens	arn:euca:bootstrap:API_43:tokens:API_43.tokens/
SERVICE	cluster           	PARTI00   	CC_53                	ENABLED 	30  	http://10.111.1.53:8774/axis2/services/EucalyptusCC	arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI00:cluster:CC_53/
SERVICE	storage           	PARTI00   	SC_53                	ENABLED 	30  	http://10.111.1.53:8773/services/Storage	arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI00:storage:SC_53/
SERVICE	bootstrap         	bootstrap 	10.111.1.43          	ENABLED 	30  	http://10.111.1.43:8773/services/Empyrean	arn:euca:bootstrap:::10.111.1.43/  
SERVICE	reporting         	bootstrap 	10.111.1.43          	ENABLED 	30  	http://10.111.1.43:8773/services/Reporting	arn:euca:bootstrap::reporting:10.111.1.43/
SERVICE	jetty             	eucalyptus	10.111.1.43          	ENABLED 	30  	http://10.111.1.43:8773/services/Jetty	arn:euca:eucalyptus::jetty:10.111.1.43/
SERVICE	imaging           	eucalyptus	10.111.1.43          	NOTREADY	30  	http://10.111.1.43:8773/services/Imaging	arn:euca:eucalyptus::imaging:10.111.1.43/
SERVICE	eucalyptus        	eucalyptus	10.111.1.43          	ENABLED 	30  	http://10.111.1.43:8773/services/Eucalyptus	arn:euca:eucalyptus:::10.111.1.43/ 
SERVICE	loadbalancingbackend	eucalyptus	10.111.1.43          	NOTREADY	30  	http://10.111.1.43:8773/services/LoadBalancingBackend	arn:euca:eucalyptus::loadbalancingbackend:10.111.1.43/
SERVICE	cloudwatchbackend 	eucalyptus	10.111.1.43          	ENABLED 	30  	http://10.111.1.43:8773/services/CloudWatchBackend	arn:euca:eucalyptus::cloudwatchbackend:10.111.1.43/
SERVICE	notifications     	eucalyptus	10.111.1.43          	ENABLED 	30  	http://10.111.1.43:8773/services/Notifications	arn:euca:eucalyptus::notifications:10.111.1.43/
SERVICE	dns               	eucalyptus	10.111.1.43          	ENABLED 	30  	http://10.111.1.43:8773/services/Dns	arn:euca:eucalyptus::dns:10.111.1.43/
SERVICE	autoscalingbackend	eucalyptus	10.111.1.43          	ENABLED 	30  	http://10.111.1.43:8773/services/AutoScalingBackend	arn:euca:eucalyptus::autoscalingbackend:10.111.1.43/
SERVICE	walrusbackend     	walrus    	WS_43                	ENABLED 	30  	http://10.111.1.43:8773/services/WalrusBackend	arn:euca:bootstrap:walrus:walrusbackend:WS_43/
[root@c-08 vic-centos-img]# euca-describe-images 
IMAGE	eki-df187f0d	vic_kvm_kernel/vmlinuz-2.6.28-11-generic.manifest.xml	546849743198	available	private	x86_64	kernel				instance-store		
IMAGE	emi-af057d0b	vic_kvm_image/vic-centos.img.manifest.xml	546849743198	available	private	x86_64	machine	eki-df187f0d	eri-f49f7aa8		instance-store	paravirtual	
IMAGE	eri-f49f7aa8	vic_kvm_ramdisk/initrd.img-2.6.28-11-generic.manifest.xml	546849743198	available	private	x86_64	ramdisk				instance-store		
[root@c-08 vic-centos-img]# euca-run-instances emi-af057d0b
euca-run-instances: error (InternalFailure): Failed to verify references for request: RunInstancesType:cbff7a86-197f-407d-9cc6-ad69f735a547:return=true:epoch=null:status=null because of: Failed to lookup image: emi-2ec04570 because of example: [MachineImageInfo kernelId=null ramdiskId=null virtType=null imageConversionId=null runManifestLocation=null manifestLocation=null signature=null checksum=null checksumType=null bundleSizeBytes=null imageName=null description=null architecture=null imagePublic=null platform=null imageType=machine permissions=[] productCodes=[] deviceMappings=[] imageSizeBytes=null imageFormat=null tags=null fullName=null ownerUserId=null ownerUserName=null ownerAccountNumber=null uniqueName=null ownerFullNameCached=null state=null lastState=null stateChangeStack=null displayName=emi-2ec04570 id=null version=null creationTimestamp=null lastUpdateTimestamp=null naturalId=null]
[root@c-08 vic-centos-img]# 
{noformat}

[~spark], I noticed that you are checking if the imaging.imaging_worker_emi property is set. In my case, QA set this property during its testing but then deleted the image without unsetting it. So currently, I have the cloud property set to an image that does not exists (see below) and the imaging service is in NOTREADY state.

{noformat}
[root@c-08 eucalyptus]# euca-describe-properties | grep ima
PROPERTY	cloud.images.cleanupperiod	10m
PROPERTY	cloud.images.defaultvisibility	false
PROPERTY	cloud.images.maximagesizegb	30
PROPERTY	imaging.imaging_worker_availability_zones	{}
PROPERTY	imaging.imaging_worker_emi	emi-2ec04570
PROPERTY	imaging.imaging_worker_enabled	true
PROPERTY	imaging.imaging_worker_healthcheck	true
PROPERTY	imaging.imaging_worker_instance_type	m1.small
PROPERTY	imaging.imaging_worker_keyname	qa_worker_key
PROPERTY	imaging.imaging_worker_log_server	10.111.1.43
PROPERTY	imaging.imaging_worker_log_server_port	514
PROPERTY	imaging.imaging_worker_ntp_server	0.centos.pool.ntp.org
PROPERTY	imaging.import_task_expiration_hours	168
PROPERTY	imaging.import_task_timeout_minutes	180
[root@c-08 eucalyptus]# euca-describe-images 
IMAGE	eki-df187f0d	vic_kvm_kernel/vmlinuz-2.6.28-11-generic.manifest.xml	546849743198	available	private	x86_64	kernel				instance-store		
IMAGE	emi-af057d0b	vic_kvm_image/vic-centos.img.manifest.xml	546849743198	available	private	x86_64	machine	eki-df187f0d	eri-f49f7aa8		instance-store	paravirtual	
IMAGE	eri-f49f7aa8	vic_kvm_ramdisk/initrd.img-2.6.28-11-generic.manifest.xml	546849743198	available	private	x86_64	ramdisk				instance-store		
[root@c-08 eucalyptus]# euca-describe-images verbose
IMAGE	eki-df187f0d	vic_kvm_kernel/vmlinuz-2.6.28-11-generic.manifest.xml	546849743198	available	private	x86_64	kernel				instance-store		
IMAGE	emi-5a09429b	precise-server-cloudimg-amd64-disk1img/precise-server-cloudimg-amd64-disk1.img.manifest.xml	546849743198	deregistered	public	x86_64	machine				instance-store	hvm	
TAG	image	emi-5a09429b	eutester-created	
TAG	image	emi-5a09429b	size	3
TAG	image	emi-5a09429b	source	http://images.walrus.cloud.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/precise-server-cloudimg-amd64-disk1.img
IMAGE	emi-af057d0b	vic_kvm_image/vic-centos.img.manifest.xml	546849743198	available	private	x86_64	machine	eki-df187f0d	eri-f49f7aa8		instance-store	paravirtual	
IMAGE	eri-f49f7aa8	vic_kvm_ramdisk/initrd.img-2.6.28-11-generic.manifest.xml	546849743198	available	private	x86_64	ramdisk				instance-store		
[root@c-08 eucalyptus]# 
{noformat}
